item.title: Salomon X Ultra MID 2 GTX aren't good
item.description: Looks like there are no normal boot manufacturers left on the planet. I welcome Salomon to my shit-list with their X Ultra Mid GTX (not sure about the exact model). Here what they look like after everyday use for just 8 months:
